Package display

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnswerProvided
    This interface allows for some classes to warn their container that the user has given an answer and that stuff needs to be performed.
    RequestToFrame
    This interface allows classes that handle stuff (like quizzes) to make requests to their container (MainFrame in my case).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnswerPanel
    This class is a cardLayout of 4 buttons that present the possible answers of a question / the explanation to that question.
    Credits
    Window to show credits and the GNU general public license
    DeckEditor
    This class is essentially a tool to edit decks.
    DeckModeChoicePanel
    This class is a menu for quiz mode.
    MainFrame
    This class contains and handles quiz.
    MessagePanel
    Allows to have a JPanel containing only a JLabel to display some text.
    QuizPanel
    class QuizPanel contains all the necessary graphical elements to display a question and answer it properly.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    QuizPanel.QuizState
    Descibes the current state of the quiz
